title: Calendar for Android Wear
summary: Google calendar for Android Wear. Quickly view, add, and edit time for events.
description: Note: Android Wear smart watch is required to use this app. Checked with Sony SmartWatch3, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, and Moto 360.View Google Calendar monthly events, quick change time / delete / add new events from your wrist!Monthly view shows different types of events in arc and circles with different color which makes you to see when you have events in quick view. You can quickly delete or change time for moved events, and quickly add new event to calendar. - White / Black colored design - Monthly view shows circles for events - Holiday calendar - Marker for day with event containing specific keyword - Quick add / delete event - Change date / time / title for event (repeated event not supported) - Various types of text input methods     Pattern     Voice input     Customizable Panels - View title, location, time and detail for evetns - Week number for ISO / US style - Monday / Sunday start - 12 / 24 hour style - Unicode Emoji inputTips: Use launcher such as Wear Mini Launcher for easy access to apps.Notes: Voice input available for entering title text, free-form command (ok, google) is not supported at this time.About permissions: Internet access - used for Japanese kana-kanji translation Read / Write Calendar - As is Vibrate - Used for vibration Wake Lock - Not used for now, might use in future to improve response speedSpecial Thanks to : icons8.com for providing great icons.
descriptionHTML:
Note: Android Wear smart watch is required to use this app. Checked with Sony SmartWatch3, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, and Moto 360.

View Google Calendar monthly events, quick change time / delete / add new events from your wrist!

Monthly view shows different types of events in arc and circles with different color which makes you to see when you have events in quick view. You can quickly delete or change time for moved events, and quickly add new event to calendar.

- White / Black colored design
- Monthly view shows circles for events
- Holiday calendar
- Marker for day with event containing specific keyword
- Quick add / delete event
- Change date / time / title for event (repeated event not supported)
- Various types of text input methods
Pattern
Voice input
Customizable Panels
- View title, location, time and detail for evetns
- Week number for ISO / US style
- Monday / Sunday start
- 12 / 24 hour style
- Unicode Emoji input

Tips:
Use launcher such as Wear Mini Launcher for easy access to apps.

Notes:
Voice input available for entering title text, free-form command (ok, google) is not supported at this time.

About permissions:
Internet access - used for Japanese kana-kanji translation
Read / Write Calendar - As is
Vibrate - Used for vibration
Wake Lock - Not used for now, might use in future to improve response speed

Special Thanks to : icons8.com for providing great icons.
comments: Great app is there going to be a update for the use of android wear 2.0 compalations
Best calendar for android wear. Hands down.
Please add option to type in events Works like a charm but events must be dictated in by voice. Please add a keypad option to do this. Would then rate 5/5. Running on Huawei watch.
please add support to type with flickkey keyboard

Turns on automatically after notifications This app looks great and I was particularly excited about the keypad for adding new events. The problem is that it turns on after I receive any notifications to my LG G Watch R, regardless of what kind of  notification I get. It also just turns on for no reason and shines at full brightness... It makes the app almost unusable if it keeps turning on by itself.
I like the functions and the app itself, but the font just kills it for me, hence only 3 stars. Please add the ability to switch to a different font, a lot of people already requested it.
recentChanges: Default to round style for unknown device type.
Fixed crashing when calendar color handling fails
Long hold item shows detail with menu open
Added delay time setting on auto recover (phone side)
Fixed wrong weekday shown in time setting
